name: Icy Dreams
description:
Controls:

Z to attack

X to jump

Left and Right arrow keys to move

P to pause

Game objective:

Your brother has been kidnapped by the nightmares of the dream world! You enter the dream world to rescue him. Defeat each enemy on a stage to move to the next. You can turn most enemies into blocks of ice, and defeat most enemies by throwing blocks of ice at them. Bigger chains are worth more points. You have three lives to get through all 30 levels.

Source code available as download or at https://github.com/spazzylemons/icy-dreams
